name: figma-plugin-boilerplate
description: A beautiful Figma plugin boilerplate with vanilla JavaScript and shadcn/ui styling

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:main && npm run build:ui
scripts.dev: npm run build && concurrently "npm run dev:main" "npm run dev:ui"
scripts.dev:ui: nodemon --watch src/components --watch src/lib --ext js --exec "npm run build:ui"
